title: Raw and Ready-To-Eat Sausage Products (adulterated)
summary: WASHINGTON, June 21, 2011 - Chicago Boxed Beef Distributors Inc., a Shorewood, Ill., establishment is recalling approximately 3,200 pounds of raw and ready-to-eat sausage products that were not handled in a manner to prevent cross contamination between raw and ready-to-eat products. In addition, the product...
impacted_products: 3.6-pound boxes of "SAUSAGE LINKS & COOKED SAUSAGE PATTIES," with each box containing 2 unlabeled packages.
